item.text: After you have registered as a user in ECAS you have to register a company.
After putting all the company details and contact person etails you have to establish whether your company is an [[SME]]
After putting all the company details and contact person etails you have to establish whether your company is an [[SME]] and to fill in the form to declare your company as an SME.
In this form

After putting all the company details and contact person etails you have to establish whether your company is an [[SME]] and to fill in the form to declare your company as an SME. It opens in the same form which opens when you register an organisation.
In this form
[[SME Form Questions]]
After you have registered as a user in ECAS you have to register a company as a Benneficiary.
Guide to the registration can be seen here: http://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/data/ref/h2020/grants_manual/lev/h2020-guide-lev_en.pdf

legal address, et
c.)

After you have registered as a user in ECAS you have to register your [[Legal Entity]] as a Benneficiary.
Viral Academy is a [[Newly Established Entity]]
Viral Academy is a [[Newly Established Entity]].
[[Viral Academy]] is a [[Newly Established Entity]].
• [[ECAS]]

• [[ECAS]]
  • [[Beneficiary Register]]
  • [[SME]]

After registration, your data has to be validated by the Validation Service team. Later only the Legal Entity Appointed Representative (LEAR) (or the persons with an "Account Administrator" role for this organisation) will be able to request the modification of the data and provide supporting documents on the My Organisations page.

Later only the [[Legal Entity Appointed Representative]] (LEAR) (or the persons with an "Account Administrator" role for this organisation) will be able to request the modification of the data and provide supporting documents on the My Organisations page.

story.text: After registration, your data has to be validated by the Validation Service team.

Later only the [[Legal Entity Appointed Representative]] (LEAR) (or the persons with an "Account Administrator" role for this organisation) will be able to request the modification of the data and provide supporting documents on the My Organisations page.
